sentence.Network_en: We beg the Government on bended knees not to cut this budget.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们恳求政府不要削减这项预算。

sentence.Network_en: He proposed to her on bended knee.
She craved for her husband's life on her bended knees.
sentence.Network_cn: 他跪着恳求救她丈夫的命.

entry.def: If you ask someone for something on bended knee, you ask them very seriously for it.

example.ex: We beg the Government on bended knees not to cut this budget.
example.tran: 我们恳求政府不要削减这项预算。

means.word_mean: 1. used of the back and knees; stooped;
